title: Prepare Final Medical Injections
description: Assist a human in preparing medical injection for patient in critical condition. Tasks include passing the test tube, picking a pre-measured powder container, holding a test tube, resting the lid, releasing the tube, sealing the test tube, and confirming patient ID.

steps.requirement: Participant signals intent to begin the last preparation.
Participant mentions the 30g powder container or implies it is required.
steps.action: Pick up the container labelled '30 grams' and place it in the middle of the table.

steps.requirement: Participant or instructor requests help during powder transfer.
steps.action: Hold the test tube securely while the powder is poured into it.

steps.requirement: The powder has been transferred and the tube no longer needs to be held.
steps.action: Release the test tube and reposition if needed.

triggers: need a brief moment exposed to the air
steps.requirement: Participant or instructor asks to leave the lid resting without sealing.
steps.action: Gently rest the lid on top of the test tube to allow air exposure.

steps.requirement: Participant or instructor gives the go-ahead to seal.
steps.action: Fully close the lid of the test tube.

steps.requirement: Participant requests ID confirmation before concluding.
steps.action: Read out the patient ID, which is 342A
